titleStmt.title: The blessednes of the Virgin Marie the mother of our Lord Iesvs Christ.
titleStmt.author: Shaw, John, 1559-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field dwelling in Great Woodstreete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The blessednes of Marie.
Copy filmed lacks title page and other preliminary pages. Title and imprint from Bodleian Library copy spliced (beginning-page 25) at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
